title: Expose orchestration protocol via MCP tools
description: Add MCP tools for the tag-based orchestration protocol, enabling agents to communicate directly without going through shell commands. This exposes the generic OrchestrationMessage (msg_type + payload) and tag-based OrchestrationTarget types as first-class MCP tools. Also includes tag management tools (fugue_set_tags, fugue_get_tags) for session classification.
user_impact: Agents become first-class participants in orchestration rather than passive recipients of nudges. This is the 'Orchestrator API Surface' that enables true agent-to-agent coordination.
